ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Het afdrukken van het rapport is afgebroken door')&' '&User (1)&' !'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select sum(decode(t.tr_indicatie, 'K', 1, 'V', -1, 0) * t.tr_aantal) totaal_aantal, sum(decode(t.tr_indicatie, 'K', 1, 'V', -1, 0) * t.tr_aantal * decode(t.tr_exass_factor, 0, 1, t.tr_exass_factor) * t.tr_prijs_factor * t.tr_prijs_tr_mntsrt) totaal_bedrag from :2 tr --TV_TRANSACTIONS_IN_PROGRESS inner join :1 t on t.tr_volgnummer = tr.trip_tr_volgnummer where 1 = 1 and tr.trip_tr_be_volgnummer = ~5 and exists (select 1 from :3 tv --TV_TRIP_REL_ACCOUNT_INFO where tv.trai_tr_volgnummer = tr.trip_tr_volgnummer and tv.trai_tr_account_code <= 4 and tv.trai_tr_re_id = ~4)
